parse.title: Letter to Kenneth I. Rasmussen, Jr.

links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
[[File:Kenneth I. Rasmussen, Jr. 12 October 1966.jpg|thumb]]
On [[12 October]] [[1966]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Kenneth I. Rasmussen, Jr.'''<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Pieter Collier]]|articleurl=http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/979-30_years_Letters_of_JRR_Tolkien.php|articlename=Something to celebrate: 30 years The Letters of J. R. R. Tolkien|dated=21 January 2011|website=TL|accessed=17 July 2012}}</ref>

*'''Subject:''' A stock reply to a letter of appreciation, to which Tolkien added: "''If you use one of the modern steel [[bows]], you should be developing a good torso!''". 
*'''Publication:''' None.
